rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions which call for actions that are the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament.

This issue is a matter for Transport for London, which is accountable to the London Assembly.

You could raise the issue directly with Transport for London. You can find out how to contact them here:

https://tfl.gov.uk/help-and-contact/

The Assembly has its own e-petitions system. You can find out how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
